title: Show 165 - David Frum
itunes:title: Show 165 - David Frum
itunes:subtitle: George W Bush's former speechwriter delivers a deâ€¦
description:
George W Bush's former speechwriter delivers a devastating assessment of Donald Trump's Presidency and electoral prospects. Expanding on the themes of his new book 'Trumpocalypse', David analyses the effect of Trump on the Republican party and the democratic structures of the United States. Credited with creating the phrase "axis of evil", David explains the reasoning behind those specific words and takes us inside George W Bush's White House. Follow David on Twitter here: @davidfrum Buy 'Trumpocalypse' here: https://smile.amazon.co.uk/Trumpocalypse-Restoring-American-Democracy/dp/B07XYBZNF1/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3BCZC2JH735P4&dchild=1&keywords=trumpocalypse&qid=1590168658&sprefix=trumpoca%2Caps%2C232&sr=8-1 Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus *** IMPORTANT TOUR UPDATE *** NEW REARRANGED DATES INCLUDE: 2 October - Corby Cube 4 October - Brighton Komedia 9 October - Chorley Little Theatre 18 October - Leeds Hyde Park Book Club 25 October - Newcastle Stand 3 November - Camberley Theatre 13 November - Alnwick Playhouse 15 November - York Crescent 19 November - Cardiff Sherman Theatre 29 November - Glasgow Stand 3 December - Southend Dixon Studio 6 December - Sheffield Leadmill

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
